"Lorraine" answered my message and was incredibly quick to respond, helped me in canceling the subscription and went a step further that I won't go into details about but it brought me to tears! She was kind, efficient, professional and a delight to work with. Definitely 5 stars for "Lorraine"!

I told them that, to send a new device and then we can see if its my area or their tech.  The customer service agent agreed, this would be the way to go to fix my CONSTANT issues, I can NEVER upload videos, circle are always spinning and it takes about 2 minutes to load a website.  It's that bad all the time.  once we both agreed that the device may be faulty thats when they stopped responding to my emails!This company is all talk no walk folks.  No walk.

Review.Titre: Failure to deliver the promised service in Egypt
Review.Contenu: We purchased a 15GB 90 day global BIZ, and then traveled to Egypt for 2 weeks on a tourist trip. While at the beginning,  in the hotel in Cairo (there was a free WiFi anyway), the device seems to operate correctly, after the second day it stopped. During our entire 2 week trip it did not work. Our phones were not able to discover it, or when they were able to discover it, it was showing no Internet connection. It ruined our trip completely.  We relied on this device and it failed to provide the promised service. Immediately after we came back to the USA everything started working correctly again. The Customer Service guy said that they DO NOT GUARANTEE that the device would work in the foreign country. What is it? Why would anybody buy a device and a plan without a guarantee that it would work in the country they are going. Meanwhile, Egypt is included in our 15G plan and it does not state that it is contingent upon available service there. Now they do not want to give as a refund, because " at some point the device has been working" and some data has been used". For me it is clearly an unfair business practice.Besides, their data service proves to be ways more expensive that any SIM card you could purchase in the other country. I cannot recommend GlocallMe. Not the GlocallMe device, neither their plans, nor their customer service.

Review.Titre: 25 GB disappeared while I did not use
Review.Contenu: I used to rent routers from GlocalMe, but purchased Duoturbo a year ago, and used it in Japan this month. I bought a Day pass for 10 days and 25GB $50 plan at same time as I needed full speed to use it for my work. I switched the priority from 25GB to Day pass while I was traveling to save data use, but somewhat while I was on Day pass, 25 GB balance went zero balance from 19.5GB. We did not use Duoturbo for streaming or youtube but 25GB plan x 2 disappeared without equivalent significant activities in just 2 days. This is ridiculous. I explained this to Lorraine and contacted her in two days over one hour to get credit for 19.5 GB but she said that their system showed data all used, so there is nothing she could do, and another technical staff would contact me in a day. This happened 5 days ago, but no action to resolve my problem has been taken by GlocalMe since then.I am scared to use their service now as I feel my data plans 25GB x 2 total $95 somewhat unreasonably disappeared but GlocalMe did not give me a fair credit, so I switched to my carrier’s 15 GB plan which would keep my whole travel period. Now I feel safer as I have used only 3GB in 5 days on my carrier’s plan with basically same intensity of use when GlocalMe showed I used 50GB in 3 days!  I will not use GlocalMe again as I cannot trust their data use administration as well as diligence of customer service any more.

Review.Titre: Flawed In-App purchase Wasted More time than data was worth!
Review.Contenu: I have had the GlocalMe device for a few years now and it has generally worked well.  I have purchased a few data plans over the years and this process has generally been smooth.  Unfortunately my last experience was anything but.  I used the GlocalMe app to try buy a plan but was faced with a shipping fee for the first time.  Why there would be a shipping fee when buying data for a mobile wifi device is beyond me.  I asked the in-app agent for advice and was told to use the pickup option (even though the pickup option had a disclaimer saying it wouldn't work due to COVID).  I followed his advice and purchased the plan with the pickup option but no data plan was delivered to me.  I then spent the next two hours with another agent trying to get my data.  Even though I provided them with screenshots of my receipt and invoice with an order number and email confirmation they could not "find" my order.  Eventually they said that my purchase had gone through their webservice (not the app) despite the fact I had only used the app for the entire process.  The agent tried to tell me to contact their webservice to sort the problem out but I refused.  He then said he would check with them himself and came back to tell me that I would get an email voucher in the next few minutes.  This took longer than expected.  Eventually the email (with help from the agent I suspect) came through and I received the data.  In the end the data purchase cost me two and a half hours of wasted time (definitely not worth the cost of the data).  I don't know what changed or if this was just a glitch but the whole process with the app was flawed.  Being charged a shipping price for buying data that is sent electronically is absurd and then having to spend more than two hours getting permission to access some electrons I had already paid for was galling to say the least.I liked the service that GlocalMe provided but if this happens again, I won't use it anymore.

Review.Titre: Buyer beware. Customer service is a nightmare and EU GlocalMe is NOT an EU based company.
Review.Contenu: I recently purchased a hotspot from GlocalMe directly from their EU site, which has a German mailing address. I ordered this in advance of a trip within my own country (Ireland) in an area where service from my cell phone company was a little poor but other providers had better service.As I ordered from a German website, I assumed (incorrectly) that the hotspot would be coming from Germany. I received a shipping notice 4 days later stating it was about to be shipped from Hong Kong and had not even left their warehouse yet. Realising this was going to be too late for my trip, I emailed customer service to cancel my order because I knew it would be too late. I received no reply.Two days later I received another shipping notice that the hotspot had left Hong Kong. I emailed once again saying I no longer wanted the hotspot and that I had tried to cancel my order two days ago. Again, no reply.Unfortunately, I ended up having to order a different GlocalMe hotspot from Amazon.co.uk. I try to avoid using Amazon, and thought by purchasing from an EU site, I was supporting businesses within the EU. Of course, I was wrong, but the GlocalMe hotspot from Amazon arrived in time for my trip.Yesterday, 9 days since I sent my original email, I received a call from DHL saying I now owe €32 worth of customs charges for a hotspot I have repeatedly tried to cancel. For a hotspot I ordered from an EU website. As I live in Ireland, and ordered from a business posing as a German/EU business, I would not expect to pay customs fees.I have now been “dealing” with online customer service for the past two days who repeatedly tell me to “email customer service there is no other solution”. I sent a third email yesterday. Still no reply and online customer service keeps saying “hold for an email reply”. I have been holding for 10 days with not even a “we have received your email and are looking into the matter” reply. My requests to escalate to a manager are met with “no one is available.” The online customer service person claims they do not know where the email response people are located or who they are. There is no phone number. They simply claim “hold for email.”As for the workings of the device itself, we were using it for a cottage with no wifi. It turns out my own mobile service works ok, but this thing absolutely chews through data. We went through 10gb a day for two days on GlocalMe, then my husband tethered everything to his phone and we were using far far less.Customer service is non-existent with this company. I am now out €140 (plus an estimated €32 of customs owed) and hours of time dealing with them. Do not order from GlocalMe.

I had purchased additional 50 GB for $99.99 and I never got it uploaded on my devise. The devise comes automatically with 8 GB which I used up in the first week. Not knowing that the other 50 GB were not loaded on my Devise, all of a sudden the devise was not working. I call the customer service company 3 times in one day, left messages and I also sent a detailed email to the customer service with all of the ID numbers on my devise to the email that was on the paperwork and never received a response. I called the following day again and someone answered from I think China. I explained to the person ( a lady) that I could hardly understand and in the background was another person talking Chinese to probably another customer on another line and she was talking so loud I could hardly hear the person I was talking to. The lady I spoke to wanted me to send the confirmation email that I bought the extra 50 GB which by the way it is only 36 GB I guess the 50 GB gets converted to 36 IN American. I never received the email confirmation of the purchase so I emailed a Screenshot of my account being charged. I call the lady back and asked if she received my email and she said yes but I would have to call back later after 1 AM My time because they were closed now. Unbelievable!!I called the next day and spoke to a Gentleman, his name was Max. He was very helpful. Had to explain everything to him again and again he asked me to send him the confirmation that I purchased the 50/36 GB. He said it would be in my Globalme app on my phone, but it wasn’t. He then asked me for a code # on my devise which I gave him and he did see my email with my screenshot of the money being charged to my account and asked if it was ok that he could upload remotely the extra 50/36 GB to my devise. Duh!! I said of course. So that is what he did and the devise worked again. I had asked why didn’t the lady I spoke to yesterday just so what he did. Naturally he said he didn’t know but I should be all set. Bottom line, very poor customer service for this product. It took 3 days to get something resolved that could have and should have been done the first day of trying to reach the customer service.

Review.Titre: I bought the GlocalMe Triforce in order…
Review.Contenu: I bought the GlocalMe Triforce in order to stream a video event from a remote lookout in northern Ontario. I tested the unit at my home and was very pleased with the upload/download speeds of 3.3/10.9 Mbps. But it failed me on the day. It could not seem to sustain more than a Kbps or so for more than a few seconds. Fortunately, a friend volunteered to let me use his smart phone as a hot spot so the streaming event was a success but I am disappointed in GlocalMe performance. I had hoped it would perform at least as well as a regular cell phone. If I missed something due to inexperience with the unit I am prepared to reassess my evaluation.

The set up was great. However, this burns through gigabytes of memory ridiculously. I'll keep it for emergencies, but I'm already lookin for alternatives. It would cost no more for me to subscribe to wifi commercially.

I have a GlocalMe WiFi device and bought the GlocalMe 8GB 30 day package for Europe ($60 cost) to use while traveling in London and Canterbury for 15 days. The service was either very poor or completely non existent during my trip.  I was able to use only about 3GB for the entire trip. If it was not for FREE WiFi in many locations I would not have been able to use my iPhone to navigate!  I contacted Glocal tech support whose advice was to sit near a window and restart the device! I tried everything but even while outside, there was NO service in Canterbury.  VERY disappointed in this and will not use again. Verizon or ATT international data plans may be more expensive but they work and are reliable unlike GlocaMe. I do not recommend buying this service if traveling in the UK.

Alipay, Paypal and WeChat pay is not used everywhere that too in Chinese!

Review.Titre: My G Pro 4 arrived quickly and was…
Review.Contenu: My G Pro 4 arrived quickly and was securely packaged.  The design is beautiful and it started right up when I turned it on.  There was not much documentation on how to set it up and use it, but I figured everything out.  Unfortunately, I could not get it to work in my remote location, even though I have good, regular internet service. However, it worked fine in town.  I'm hoping that it will have good reception when I travel to various places around the world...fingers crossed.  I think that for the price, it should include a cover, or carrying case.

If I could buy data and know I can use everything I buy, it would be a clearer choice to buying a local SIM card.

Review.Titre: Simplify purchases and accounting so we know what we need and see what we have, please
Review.Contenu: GLocalMe is a valuable tool for those who rely on portable high speed secure internet. However purchasing length of time and data speed is all about buying packages and all about apparent discounts. I need a way to see what I have. If I buy a package that turns out to be too slow and then buy a faster package, what happens to the money for the slower package?  How can one try out different speeds to see what is adequate? So, no surprise I have an important project and I can’t experiment so I buy the fastest in a panic.

However, I'd be interested in packages that provide similar amounts of data but with longer expiry terms such as 90 or 120 days, and I'd pay extra for the service.

The device understandably lost signal in numerous locations, however, the data vanished so quickly given the fact that it kept searching for signal most of the time. The data packages are expensive and if you have kids who watch YouTube and play games, the 12GB will vanish in no time, especially where there is bad or no signal. But as I have investigated other data plans from other companies, I realize now that your plans are seriously over priced. I would love to see a USA only plan that is not so high priced. i will be going to T-Mobile, $50.00 a month for 100GB!

At this point, I feel abused as a customer, paying for minutes that weren't honored (even if it is in your feel safe (for you) policies. 3 stars is the max. for me. You have left me hanging with less in my wallet."I want the money for my unused minutes back nd real options."Otherwise stop paying for Youtube adds etc. Advertising to me when I am already a customer. You steal money and time. Your questions are a waste of my time and your money. Why are you asking? Every video reminds of how I and others were f'uped over. I don't know or care to read your obstructive insistence on review of your terms and conditions in order to leave a comment. I am leaving this and check your "I accept" box but I don't agree. This is in order to leave a comment. I do not accept your conditions.
Came quickly. Easy to use. I bought to use mostly for video conferencing. Performance has been disappointed. I can use it but lose video frequently.

Review.Titre: The product works well but the 30 day…
Review.Contenu: The product works well but the 30 day limit for data is too challenging to manage. It is very hard to predict what you will use in 30 days.
I like my Glocal, I do not like that it activates the data plan immediately upon turning on, that is my only problem thus far.

Review.Titre: The service is good but there is…
Review.Contenu: The service is good but there is limited coverage in southern Africa.   Would be very helpful to have coverage in Malawi and in Zimbabwe if possible.

Review.Titre: the glocal me receiver does not work…
Review.Contenu: the glocal me receiver does not work . the company took my opinion into account and  is working to improve the situation . Thanks for their feedback
For some reason Apple store does not like the network. When I’m connected I can’t download or update my software on my phone or iPad.
The pricing on this is a bit ridiculous. You might as well go with your local cell phone provider for a product like this
They double the price on almost everything. It is expensive. But, because I bought the devise, I have to use to go out of town.
Technically absolute fine. The tariffs are more expensive in Europe compared to competitors. Thus a review is recommended.

Review.Titre: The internet is good but more expensive…
Review.Contenu: The internet is good but more expensive than your competitors who offer the same quality m, such as Skyroam.

Review.Titre: Theres very little option on the data…
Review.Contenu: Theres very little option on the data package on each country and the global package is alittle expensive.
Data for countries such as Germany is too expensive. So, I have to use other services and not GlocalMe.

Review.Titre: All good apart from the invoicing
Review.Contenu: All good apart from the invoicing. For me to get an invoice is very tedious and needs to be improved
Our need for internet access is in Plymouth, MA, where GlobalMe works some but not all of the time.

Review.Titre: Works as it should I suppose lol
Review.Contenu: Works as it should, the plans for Canada should be a bit less pricey but it does the trick

Review.Titre: Support was slow and I figured out what…
Review.Contenu: Support was slow and I figured out what I needed to do before they got back to me.

Review.Titre: Getting better than before I purchased…
Review.Contenu: Getting better than before I purchased data plan this time getting faster no buffering
The mini pocket is nice, but the battery and the conection is very poor...
Very long time Log in.When signal is weak, do not log in at all.
Expensive, glitchy service that blows through Data.

Review.Titre: Ist always too expensive the Mobile…
Review.Contenu: Ist always too expensive the Mobile companys are cheaper.
says 4g but doesn't really support video calls

Review.Titre: The cost of data is higher than other…
Review.Contenu: The cost of data is higher than other competitors!!!
You need to fix the signal coverage worldwide!
The support is very eficient. Thank you Lucas !

Very useful, especially when traveling.  Customer Service is great too. Diana was very helpful with an issue I was having with a plan purchase.  My only complaint is that the plans can be a bit expensive, but they frequently offer coupons that help defray the cost a bit.

Review.Titre: The real time customer service (Max was…
Review.Contenu: The real time customer service (Max was great) is always accessible and effective. I only continue to use my device because of this as package rates are more expensive now. Avoid using for GPS or streaming movies as it’ll gobble your data.

Review.Titre: I got my GlocalMe DueTurbo today
Review.Contenu: I got my GlocalMe DueTurbo today. having trouble and accidentally activate the Data plan. so I talk to the Online support name Max. He patiently help me and solve my problem for a 70 senior. I thank you him.

Review.Titre: I was successful in buying a package I…
Review.Contenu: I was successful in buying a package I was interested in. Lucas came on real time client assistance and found the link I needed. Then he coached me on how to use my balance in my account and my 20% discount coupon.
I have had bad experiences before when contacting their support but Diana did great, was very helpful and patient with me. And solved the problem too.

Review.Titre: Farro was very patient and gives…
Review.Contenu: Farro was very patient and gives instructions as to how to fix my concerns.

When you shipped it to me it got stuck at the post office and someone else was able to pick it up. How I don’t know but not my problem. you were given a correct address and I have filed a complaint with the post office. Was a signature not needed. How amazingly incompetent. To say i am pissed off is a understatement. No return calls which I can’t get through to anyone as it blocks my call’s and emails!!!!! Well let’s say that you have one of the best scams going. I’ll be placing all the bad press I can do to prevent you from ripping off anyone else. If you have the balls to reply to this review and I will be happy to discuss a replacement for the one I didn’t receive at no charge to me. Sincerely, Richard C Granger CEO QCB Appliance GroupNovember 29 2022I needed to update the review because it was not Glocalme’s fault on the product not arriving it got lost in the post office box and I apologize for ranting about the way it was shipped. Upon talking with Cara from the support team she assured me that they would send a new wifi product and take care of the problem. After a week the product was located and it was connected to the internet and worked great but the amount of data it used for streaming was not what I wanted so I’ll be returning it to the company for a refund. I have no problem with the product it worked great for the first few hours and one movie 9 gigs of data was used up. Not going to work for my situation. Sincerely,Richard Granger

Review.Titre: RecievLooks a lot nicer than earlier set.
Review.Contenu: Recieved in very nice FedEx parcel envelop. Yet to use.

Review.Titre: Mobile wi-fi unit was a valuable asset on my trip
Review.Contenu: The mobile wi-fi unit I rented was valuable to me in Mexico and worked fine.  I did have problems reaching Glocal for my pre-paid return label, for the item, in a timely manner.  After several efforts, on my part,  they contacted me and assured me there would be no additional charges. I was satisfied with the unit I rented and customer service, though delayed, was responsive.

Review.Titre: Talking with this company via the chat…
Review.Contenu: Talking with this company via the chat and via email is excellent. Incredibly fast response and the people resolved my issue. Phone calls I did not receive much help. My wifi device did have an issue but the person named Farro on the chat resolved it very quick. These people know what they are doing!

Review.Titre: Very quick and good customer service…
Review.Contenu: Very quick and good customer service support from Mike.  Bought a G4 pro and wanted to try out the free data that comes with the device.  Unfortunately didn’t work.  Contacted online chat and Mike helped to isolate problem swiftly, along with answering a few questions I had.  Truely good job.

So far so good.  We rented roaming man last year.  This year we purchased glocalme, duoturbo, dual modem.  Connecting was easy enough although to be honest roaming man is even easier.  The real test will be the 1150 mile road trip through four states.  Reason for glocalme duoturbo was last year's device would lose the connection and my kid would have to sign back into her virtual class everytime.  This year will we see if the duoturbo makes a difference with dropped connections.  Also, the duoturbo and data package were a better deal this year over roaming man.

Only giving 4 out of 5 stars because I haven't actually used the device yet for travel.  Just wanted to say that set up really is as easy as they say  and I am just a reasonably tech savvy senior !   Also, had a data question and received a very prompt reply.Looking forward to using this on my travels.P.S. Have now used the device in both Canada and  the U.S. and it provides excellent high speed internet.  Very satisfied 🙂As a follow up...have since used the device in Europe and Costa Rica. Also use it at our cottage in a remote part of Ontario Canada.

Works great. Was able to have a mix of 12 computers, tablets and phones attached and all streaming video at the same time with little lag. Impressive. Only issue was stting up VPN and hidden network. But thst could have been user error. I'd purchase this again. Great choice for on the go type people.
Mostly very good customer support. Fast response and quickly addressed  issues and concerns.Difficult to follow instructions given for and on the App.

After receiving the device, I realised the whole thing was shipped from Shenzhen China, which you guys could easily add a button send to Macau… instead of traveling all the way from China to USA and back to China. LOL pretty wasteful…The device firmware still unstable, some options can’t be change, or it will crash and restart… Anyway is the ONLY 5G MiFi at the moment, so if you need it, just go for it!

Review.Titre: Assistance that was provided excellent but...
Review.Contenu: The email assistance was excellent.  The phone support also was excellent. Although very knowledgable, one of the individuals who helped me was very difficult to understand.  The other was not.  Since using the device, it is burning through data at a faster than expected rate.  I would have initially given 5 stars but it seemed like I should not have had to contact customer support so much to rectify errors on your end (length in which data packages were valid).

Review.Titre: Works well but Quick Start is not so quick
Review.Contenu: Everything works just fine and we're pleased with the performance. The setup was a bit awkward. Things that appeared in the Quick Start manual were not quite the same as the things that appeared on the device's screen. I got lost several times and had to backtrack and redo my work. Annoying but, ultimately, it performs well and meets our needs effectively.

Review.Titre: The concept of the device is fantastic
Review.Contenu: The concept of the device is fantastic. The biggest problem is that if you get into an area that it can't connect, there's no way for them to help you. They WILL bend over backwards trying though! Our home internet went down last night and I got the device out to use so I could work. The connection was very slow and kept dropping. Stephen was great and definitely gets 5 stars! Everything is working well now but, this also means I have to go back to adulting!

Review.Titre: It’s worked well at my house
Review.Contenu: It’s worked well at my house. I’ve been using it for work to test it, however, I’ve noticed after using it for a couple of days for about 2 to 3 hours, I get a message stating that AT&T has temporarily blocked service. This typically lasts about 15 to 20 minutes.  I am hoping to use this on the road while traveling so that I can work. I plan to test it soon on a trip to see how well it works in different locations. Overall I’m pretty happy with it.

Review.Titre: The service signal in Québec is very good !
Review.Contenu: The service signal in Québec is very good !!! But the price of data package is a bit high ... i use the G4 Pro and it work good  i have seen it use Bell and rogers in my city but i cant talk about other region for now  but i love it and i would love to try the new one from glocalme !!

Fr Canada 🇨🇦:Great little, easy to use device. Its just like a cell phone that you hotspot into… so easy to use, monitors use and limits at a glanceBuying/using purchase data is simple.The ONLY challenging item so far is figuring out how to prioritize bought data packages. Would be bice is a bit more focus on that screen to understand the tiered use (global vs local). Ive worked from my campsite! How awesome is THAT!?

The team was really helpful. They explained what I did not know and were not sure about. Great job glocalme.Unfortunately the device that interest me is avalilable only in Germany and the other will be a new entry, I hope also in Italy, in september. I'm looking for device with both choices sim card and plans.

Review.Titre: On a 2 week vacation from FL TO ME
Review.Contenu: On a 2 week vacation from FL TO ME, driving in our RV.  I purchased the GLOCALME, We stay overnight at campgrounds and Rest Area, with other truckers.  Never did I have problem with getting on the Internet and so many data plans to choose from, especially data sales.  I recommend this product

It's been a month, and the GlocalMe has become my source for home internet. Enough speed for streaming, daily business, and casual surfing of the internet. Terms are clear and more data always available in the app if needed at reasonable rates. Sometimes the device will have trouble booting up a usable network, but it's temporary. A quick restart solves the problem.

Review.Titre: My wife and I recently began to travel…
Review.Contenu: My wife and I recently began to travel extensively in our motorhome and the places we most often stay are out of cellphone range. We spent quite a bit of money and time trying the different methods for internet access.Then we found Glocalme through ZDnet. Now we have high speed internet access as long as there is sky above us. It is easy to get the receiver and completely online after that; no chip needed.We mainly travel in the US but they have international service. If you try it, you won't be sorry.

Pros: Great product! Very quick and easy to use, from set up to daily data consumption. Great for basic use such as google maps, messenger, etc. Battery has a long life too. Would buy it again as it meet my needs.Cons: Bahamas, where i live, is not included on the list with coverage. Internet is sometimes very slow.

Review.Titre: I found it a little difficult to cancel…
Review.Contenu: I found it a little difficult to cancel my subscription and had to get assistance. However, Max was very helpful and reimbursed me for a data plan that I was not going to use.

Review.Titre: I was trying to sign in to my account
Review.Contenu: I was trying to sign in to my account, I was waiting for  SMS to verify, but It did not be received. Finally I decided to contact to GlocalMe for help. Stephen immediately helped me to solve this problem. In whole GlocalMe is very good product and I would recommend it to those who are looking for this kind of service.

Review.Titre: The service provided is very good
Review.Contenu: The service provided is very good. But bear in mind the router that they are selling are not so much reliable and suffering of weak signal. More over for Europe local pre paid sim cards are effectively more economical.I do like the fact that the charges are clear, and were ever I go globally, service is there as promised.

Package came fast. Nicely packaged. U3 supper easy to use and set up. Maybe to easy. Purchase a data plan that wanted to use for a trip. I logged in (super easy) just wanted to play with the unit. Just turning on the unit it activated my date plan. A bit disappointed I have to get more data. Hoping the user name a password was going to be  a bit easier to change and or share. Overall please so far will see how things go with my travels.Update: customer service reached out quickly. Offered lots of solutions. Great company to work with

Purchased a package for Germany, but was close to the Austrian border still in Germany. GlocalMe support was very helpful and after I moved away from the border I was able to start my data package and was still able to use it while close to the border again. Hanks for the good, quick and helpful support

My husband and I are Snowbirds and I still day trade in the stock market.  I needed something that would give me access to internet any where I went, and I needed it to be secure for banking purposes.  Our trip this year takes us to the southern U.S. so we did alot of driving, from Ontario, Canada..  The GlocalMe G4Pro I have, allowed me to play games, watch movies or read books while travelling.  It made the trip more fun.  The G4 transitioned from tower to tower, and provider to provider seamlessly.  I would recommend it to anyone.The only reason it didn't get 5 stars is that I, personally, found the rates just a little too high.  It should actually be 4.8 stars.

Excellent delivery time. Love the device.. very user friendly. The website was a challenge for me, I almost did not order several times because the website kept converting to non-English script. My final attempt was through Facebook link and that worked. So far, product has had stellar performance.

I purchased the U2s to use while camping. It works great as long as you have cell service, no cell service and it's useless. I bought a package but didn't use it all, yet after a certain numbers of days it expired so that made the package not such a good deal after all. I had thought there was a "pay as you go" option which I thought you just paid for what you used, but I couldn't find it In spite of these few things, I like it and it's a great option for WiFi when it's otherwise unavailable.

Review.Titre: Easy to set up and use
Review.Contenu: Easy to set up and use, has good service in a place I would otherwise have nothing.  I wish there were more reasonable data plans but in a pinch when I just want convenient WiFi in a remote area, it worked well and was worth the price for service.

Review.Titre: One time I request stop the service and…
Review.Contenu: One time I request stop the service and re-star again 3 months later because I delay an international trip due to COVID-19 but the support people didn’t help me even when they respond to me immediately.International service si good if you are in a cell phone signal cover area/zone.

Works well and I’m pleased with overall performance and connectivity. Difficult to get service in some 4G areas often resulting in dropped calls, incomplete texts sent. The data burns through really fast in East Africa

Review.Titre: I found self help directions incomplete…
Review.Contenu: I found self help directions incomplete and the chat helpers beyond efficient and helpful.   While I’m still not clear how to sign my smart TV on to WiFi, I’m content to watch movies on my iPad.  My tv seemed to remain signed onto WiFi the first month but will not sign on this second month.  My iPad is dropping off WiFi frequently during this second month and slow to reconnectThe transition of service between the first and second months was awkward with too many days between purchase and renewal.  Your policy of temporary access to allow purchase to take place was nice.Other than keeping a charge on the modem, the WiFi experience is great..

After having some difficulty placing my order on the website. A real live person called and was very helpful, quickly resolving the problem and placing the order over the phone. It was refreshing to speak with a person instead of a computer.The wifi signal is strong and reliable, My only complaint is that the giga bites seem to be used up more quickly than other wifi services I have used. The app shows a detailed record of kila bites used according to date and time, It would be very helpful if a total to date were shown in giga bites, so running out of data could be anticipated.

Review.Titre: The unit seems difficult to charge
Review.Contenu: The unit seems difficult to charge, with the cables that were provided not being all that effective. And, it can't make the signal stronger in an area where it isn't strong already, but it is a good second source of internet even when there is one in place already.

Review.Titre: Over all this is a nice mobile WiFi…
Review.Contenu: Over all this is a nice mobile WiFi device. I have the U3. I found it powered up quick and connected to my phone quick and connected to WiFi quick. My first use was in northern lower Michigan where there was only water, trees and bears and it had no problem connecting to WiFi. I was able to watch tv, surf And use my phone like I was at home. They have many different packages for mb to suit your needs. The only drawback is you have to use it or lose it. I bought 6mb got 6 mb free but only used 10mb. I’m quite happy overall and would recommend this device to anyone.

Review.Titre: There is a room for small improvement
Review.Contenu: Since last years I can not see any improvment in GlocalMe service. I was saying for the long time that GlocalMe it is all seamen "must have" equipment but now with available eSims may be you should think also about this option to have eSim available too?

I have enjoyed using the GlocalMe portable device. Easy access and use. The only negative is the battery life. In order to last for my 18 hour day I have to charge it overnight and charge it again towards the end of my work portion of the day.

Review.Titre: Very User Friendly, No Nerd required
Review.Contenu: Got up and running in no time, worked right out of the box and seemed to perform better as the days went by. Was a bit slow at first but after a few days worked great. Was delivered very fast a day early!

I used GlocalMe in Bahrain, the coverage was good. I didn't use all of my load becaue my company had me fly out early. Just wishing there was a way to pause the load for a future trip or transfer it to another package when things change.

Really handy mobile wifi - we use this during travel (most recently South East Asia) and when the home broadband is down.  Really useful and if you need a wifi source that is flexible and affordable for a temp purpose - highly recommended

I purchased this not too long ago.  So far, it works well.  I have not used it a lot though.  It was easy to set up and pair to my android phone and PC laptop.  I will come back and 5 star it if it does this well all year!

Review.Titre: I have to visit many countries for my…
Review.Contenu: I have to visit many countries for my job. Glocal me was working at any places.Sometimes it is very difficult to book new credit via your mobile phone when you have no connection. But after you get your credits its working fine.

Review.Titre: I had some issues with a software…
Review.Contenu: I had some issues with a software update shortly after purchasing.  It had to be explained via chat with the person from GlocalMe.  It was resolved eventually but it seems something like software updates should just be automatic.

Speedy customer service with online chat. They resolved my problem quickly as I bought a local data package and it could not work. Step by step instructions and Jenny managed to find the solution in 15 minutes.

Review.Titre: This Device has some bugs but still good
Review.Contenu: This Device has some bags. But overall it’s your best option for pay as you go mobile data without a contract.Pros: pay as you go, easy to monitor usages, easy settingsCons: switching locations and therefore switching networks can be tough. It’s always a risk that the one you switch to isn’t better than the one you already are connected to. Also, sometimes if you switch networks it will tell you it needs to “bind” to an account because it disconnected itself from yours. But without WiFi you can’t bind it. So it’s a hassle to fix.Pro tip!! Always email customer services they are great. But in some instances they will need it connected to a wifi or other network to be able to provide support
Works as expected. Data packages not so competitive with local sim cards, but still a great alternative to going out of your way to find a vendor. 5 stars if *coupons* or *sales* are more frequent.

Review.Titre: Need to have more data plans to choose…
Review.Contenu: Need to have more data plans to choose from. Need to have clear instructions and steps to teach us how to use.

Works as it should, very dependable, adequate rates.Wish we could carry over unused data or stop package (pause) when plans change. Wish it would cover more countries for seamless travel.I would buy it again.

Review.Titre: This is my second GlocalMe hotspot
Review.Contenu: This is my second GlocalMe hotspot. While I like the service and quality of the units I was surprised to find out that in order to use the second unit I had to create a new account. I can only monitor one of the units at a time so I loaded one on my cellphone and the other on my iPad. While this works for me, it is a bit cumbersome. I have had hotspots from other companies that didn’t work in many areas where we travel but the GlocalMe has not let me down. I travel in an rv and with my GlocalMe I operate a Ring doorbell and can use our laptops, phones, and pads. While it isn’t cheap, when we choose to, we can stream our favorite tv shows from different online products. I am pleased with the quality and functionality of the hotspot devices.

Buying packages is very easy, status info with app is very helpful to monitor data usage and control use of packages. More variants in offered data packages (volume, validity) would be a great improvement!

Review.Titre: It’s very good that I can always have…
Review.Contenu: It’s very good that I can always have WiFi on all the time. A little too expensive but when I paid for just 50gigs it was a little bit too slow but I could’ve been faster but over all I enjoyed it though.
I had a good experience with this hotspot. It isn't lightning-fast, but it's capable, solid, and was good enough to get me through work while my home internet was delayed.
Great service and value for what you pay. Sometimes the device pops out of the net and you need to restart. This takes a few minutes and is the only reason I won't give a 5star rating. Cheers :)
Had an issue with changes to the data plan I normally purchase and Mike was very helpful in resolving! I have faith he’s going to resolve it permanently too! Thx Mike!

Review.Titre: The device works well, but pricey plans!
Review.Contenu: The device itself works well. A little spotty at times. My only complaint is the cost of the different plans that is available. I wish I knew what plans were available before purchasing.

Review.Titre: This is a great device to use abroad…
Review.Contenu: This is a great device to use abroad and in the U.K. I use it all the time when we are camping in the U.K. and it’s great with two kids for an evening movie when we are cooking .

Review.Titre: 5stars for Stephen, 4 for G3, 3 for other support, Sorry!
Review.Contenu: Technical support by Stephen is excellent, prompt and courteous. On support chatting, he resolved all the troubles which did exist. My G3 did not perfectly work right away out of the box as I thought. Even my latest Google Android v11 phone and my minimal tech handiness, I could not get my phone to work with GlocalMe App properly without help. I suppose that was not to happen with me. I reached out for help. Unfortunately and initially, via email, web-chatting and phone calling was not very responsive and resolving the matter until Stephen managed to solve the whole problems in one go in about 15 minutes. After that, my G3 and data packages have worked perfectly as advertised. I wish there were no such troubles. Otherwise, GlocalMe would be qualified as a 5-star product and services.
Signal is not available everywhere when we are far from big centres but generally, it is very good. The price is good to, especially with the two for one offer. It should always be that way.

Review.Titre: I am new to the cellular world
Review.Contenu: I am new to the cellular world. I had a lot of questions for GlocalMe. I kept asking until I understood what was sent to me. GlocalMe never got tired of answering my questions.
I updated my original review because they had followed up on my issues and put sincere efforts into resolving them. It was a simple proof about how they consider customer value.

Review.Titre: Device often loses connection or it…
Review.Contenu: Device often loses connection or it takes ages until connection is established.Beside that prices are very fair and a good alternative to my phone provider data plans.

Review.Titre: Worked for a long time in different…
Review.Contenu: Worked for a long time in different countries. Today it won’t boot. But a chat with the service could solve the problem in minutes. I’m happy with this.
I contacted the hotline (via chat) due to a problem with my device (neos). Mike from the online service quickly responded and my problem is resolved.

Review.Titre: The wifi seems to be very slow.
Review.Contenu: The wifi seems to be very slow.  Customer Service contacted me to say that they had tweaked my account.  There has been improved performance.

Review.Titre: Great device but a little confusing as…
Review.Contenu: Great device but a little confusing as to which plan to choose when you are primarily streaming video—-also doesn’t work well when cell service is poor
Asked a quick question, and Mike answered it quickly and accurately (I think, have not actually tried it yet!) LOL Seems easy enough.

Review.Titre: Quite easy to use with the data i…
Review.Contenu: Quite easy to use with the data i bought & lasted ok over 5 days holiday for several devices. Yet to try & use with overseas sim card.

Review.Titre: Good for use but long starting time
Review.Contenu: Long waiting time, good for many countries and areas. If starting time was shorter, I would be more than happy.

Review.Titre: Good connection worked as soon as I…
Review.Contenu: Good connection worked as soon as I landed - I recommend activating it before leaving your home country. Pricey though but somewhat worth it.

Review.Titre: I love to travel with my Glocalme
Review.Contenu: I love to travel with my Glocalme - always reliable  can share it with my wife and kids when we travel abroad without incurring terrible roaming fees.
Mike helped me with questions about choosing equipment to be used abroad.Mini Turbo or Duo Turbo are the options recommended.

Review.Titre: Max was able to guide me in order to…
Review.Contenu: Max was able to guide me in order to get my device working again. It helped to discharge it completely and charge it again. Thanks!

Review.Titre: Mike assisted in getting my WiFi to…
Review.Contenu: Mike assisted in getting my WiFi to work.  However, my screen does not show the plan I purchased which is the $380, 365 day 100 GB plan.
Northern Ontario Cottage connected :-)This device and plans are perfect of my remote northern Ontario cottage.

Update: 5/13/2022After my initial post on Trustpilot a representative reached out to me and satisfactorily resolved the problem. Thank you Trustpilot and the representative who reached out to me to resolve the issue.  —————————Great device. Horrible customer service! I have had my device for years. My charging port needs to be replaced. I went through Glocal Me’s website and inquired about an out of warranty repair. Instead of having me ship my device to them for a diagnosis and quote they were pressuring me to buy a new device. I declined and they kept repeating the same thing. I asked if they had a service and repair center. They said yes. I told them I’m willing to pay for the repair. I asked for a location to mail my device to or provide me with an authorized repair center near me. I was told they had no authorized locations in the US; however, I just found one in New York. Again they were pressuring me to buy another device. I declined again and asked for a supervisor. I was told all were on vacation and I would have to wait a week until they return. I will never buy another device or continue to refer clients to them.

Review.Titre: Download speeds have been spotty at…
Review.Contenu: Download speeds have been spotty at times and streaming of movies has been consistently interrupted, sometimes for minutes at a time.
Easy to use.Good to use it when you go to overseas trip. I used this when I went to Italy, Germany, Austria and Czech. I did not have problem.
Nice tool for business travellers. It's still having room for improvement, like stability of data transfer, but manly it is very useful.

Review.Titre: It is only english oder Chinese no…
Review.Contenu: It is only english oder Chinese no other languages available. Permanent advitersment. Data packages at least for Germany too Werk.

Review.Titre: It’s good with the 30 days plan but if…

Review.Titre: I bought a Glocalme G3 last year and…
Review.Contenu: I bought a Glocalme G3 last year and traveled with it in China for a month, in Hong Kong for a week and in New-Zealand for four months. Glocalme Always gave me an optimal connection with a local  provider, even in the middle of nowhere. Not having to find out myself  which provider offered  good connections in a particular area and not having to buy multiple sim cards was very convenient. I just turned on the Glocalme hotspot and we were able to use 2 mobile phones and two tablets simultaneously every time. I have occasionally also  used it as  a spare battery to recharge my phone. Topping up my bundle on line was convenient too. Glocalme has a good choice  in bundles of  varying validity times and sizes for  the different  countries and area's. I can recommend it for all travelers.It may not be your cheapest option but it is convenient and trustworthy when you travel far away. I absolutely recommend using the Glocalme G3.  But remember to also get a good quality VPN subscription before you leave! Hans Roelofs, The Netherlands. Sept. 26 2020.

Pretty easy to use. Worked well using it in ihr trailer to watch Netflix, which used up our data fairly quickly.
I would give 5 stars if data lasted a little more than 30 days. I would still recommend this service to others.

Review.Titre: Had a problem with the device as we…

Review.Titre: This has to be the most useful travel…
Review.Contenu: This has to be the most useful travel tool ever. It’s an absolute dream to use - simple and efficient. The app makes very clear what packages are available and at what price.,Then, you simply hook up and use your very own portable wifi. Just LOVE IT!!

Now, today ive had multiple issues and reach out to their customer service and came across Diana. Diana was the first agent that really went to find a solution for my issue.  Felt inmense gratitute as she saved me a lot of frustration! Thank you Diana.

I was very pleased with my recent contact to the support team. I accidentally activated a new device with the wrong account but Diana helped me internally with the transfer of the included data balance to the correct account. Friendly, quickly & straight forward, as it should be.

During my travels in Europe, I really a trustworthy internet connection for my job. To my surprise, even in the far-off countryside of Ireland, I managed to find reliable Wi-Fi. Plus, whenever I had any issues and had to reach out to their customer support, they were always super fast and helpful.

Review.Titre: Great customer service on the road
Review.Contenu: I have used GlocalMe in Europe, Asia and North America, for the most part without problems. Customer service on the road, though not much needed, has always been fast and efficient. Thanks Lucas for your speedy help while I was in Tokyo recently to correct a problem when my device, though still working, presented with a lock screen.

Review.Titre: To Be A Professional Digital Nomad Or Not To Be
Review.Contenu: I didn't want to indulge myself and buy one of the most expensive items out there. I wanted to pull myself back and say I didn't need the 5g. But here I am abroad, teaching online, in a foreign country, where both the hotel wifi and the local sim card I bought, failed one day. I used my Glocal Me Numen Air, with a 4g GM plan for the first time and it worked clear as day. It then saved me again the next day when the same thing happened. Extremely pleased. Thanks for saving my job. Go big or go home!

Review.Titre: As soon as Elaine came on her shift at…
Review.Contenu: As soon as Elaine came on her shift at 17:44 everything became easy. She first reviewed the chat string. Then she showed me how to find my phone imei. Then she accessed my account, forwarded my request to Clink. The next day I received an email giving me an extra 10%off my data package which was on sale again at a lower price.

I used my glocalme for 6 years nowsuper Efficient wherever I am but The masterpiece is the customer service, that makes THE big difference with others sellerMy last experience with Diana was super clear, quick and efficient.They now how to keep clients !!

Excellent Customer Support! Diana helped me with corrections on my account to my data plan and did everything quickly and without any hesitation! It's great to have this Numen Air device for travel, but the great support that comes with it is also an unexpected plus!

Since retiring, my wife and I are doing more traveling than ever...and GlocalMe goes with us wherever we go. Reliable service and it is much cheaper than paying for an extended cellphone plan. We have used it in North America, all over Europe and in the Islands. We have the Duo Turbo and the Sim card comes in handy where Glocal service isn't provided. It also serves as our cottage Wifi as service is not available in our area .

Review.Titre: Excellent Customer Service:  Fast and Focused…

G4 Pro had a way to connect with Tech Support, and Elain helped solve my problem within 5 minutes, even while a GlocalMe device upgrade was happening.  I'm not a techie at all, but I was able to follow setup and get this device working well, with Elain's quick support, in little time.  I'm road testing this in Singapore and Japan, but so far it seems to work great - faster service than my cellular service!

During my last work travel experience, I had an issue with my Duo Turbo where the physical SIM card stopped working, despite still having data. I wanted to test the hotspot before my next work trip and Farro set me up with 8GB of North America data for me to try my hotspots to ensure they were working. So far the hotspots work excellently with the data purchased from GlocalMe and have not worked all that well using a physical SIM card.... I'm hoping this next work trip goes more smoothly!

Review.Contenu: I think that Glocal online customer service could be one of the easiest and best customer service I have had in recent years. I had a few questions about one of my coupons and wanted a little clarification on having multiple packages for a single country and the terms in which they would trigger/expire so I reached out to the support team via the android app and was connected with Lucas. Lucas was was extremely helpful and was able to   provide me with a clear and concise yet detailed explanation my packages would work, and when each would kick in. On top of all of that he was able to provide me with a replacement coupon code since the one I had intended to use has recently expired! Over it was a very help and pain free experience!

We used 5 devices and never had a problem with the connections, even my husband was impressed how fast the wifi is...and their plans are cheaper than Solis.

For some reason it wasn’t loading webpages and just didnt seem to work so i ended up using hotel wifi. I thought maybe my device was outdated with all the 5G products now. So i contacted Glocalme online about my experience and was messaging with Lucas to ask whether i needed to update my device to a new 5G. He was very helpful and gave me a free data plan to test my G3 again in the UK. It is working fine so possibly it was the area i was in up North that didnt have good wifi reception but i have used my G3 all over the world previously. Anyways, i will see how i get on but i wanted to say thank you to Lucas for his helpfulness.

It seemed too good to be true. But I took the chance, and now having used my device all over the world, I'm very happy with it. Who needs a phone plan anymore. Review.Titre: Wherever you are, Glocalme is there for you.
Review.Contenu: I have been a Glocalme customer since 2016 while in Fiji. I have used my portable Wifi over the years and had no complaints. More recently, I updated my unit to the Duo Turbo with Glocalme in anticipation of working on Semester at Sea (2023) and needing a portable Wifi while I was traveling to many countries (and being out at sea) and dependent on Wifi for my job. Many of us on the voyage needed reliable Wifi, but I was the only one with a Glocalme Duo Turbo unit and experience with this company. While on a ship, we went from Dubai to India to Kenya to Jordan to Croatia and further. Whether we were out at sea or in port, Glocalme made sure I had Wifi - and it did not cost me a fortune, in fact, it was incredibly affordable. Once I got back to the US, I had to be in a remote part of Michigan where Wifi access was poor. I did not think that in the US the Glocalme service was an option, but it was. And so I bought a 30 day package and I am using my computer, streaming, downloading files and feel very supported, here in Michigan. Just today I texted with Diana (a real person) and she helped me fix some issues which were not Glocalme issues, they were my Settings issues. And she gave me a discount code so I could further reduce my costs. I cannot say enough good things about this company. I live and work in the US and in over 90 countries in the world. There is nothing like Glocalme. Their products work, their prices are very competitive, and their support personnel are amazing. Thank you, Glocalme. I owe my professional life survival to you!!
